name: Buying Time (BirdWorks)
description:
A relaxing day at the beach...

Until your
keys
went missing and your parking meter is
out of time!

Metal detector in hand,
 find coins for the meter
and your keys to flee!

Be wary,
for crabs and seagulls 
will pick your pockets!

Walk with arrow keys,
scan with spacebar
and dig with left shift.
